metadata.title: TranslateGemma - Online Translation Tool
metadata.description: No more tolerating mechanical translation. With Google TranslateGemma, achieve native-level contextual translation on any device. Based on the latest Gemma 3 architecture, it offers an intelligent density translation engine supporting 55+ languages, with offline operation and cloud deployment capabilities.

terms.title: Terms of Service - TranslateGemma
terms.description: View the terms of use for TranslateGemma AI translation services, including service usage rules, license agreements, and user rights and responsibilities

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - TranslateGemma
privacy.description: Learn how TranslateGemma handles user data and protects privacy to ensure the security of your translated content

cookies.title: Cookie Policy - TranslateGemma
cookies.description: Learn how TranslateGemma uses Cookies and related technologies to optimize user experience and website performance

demoBanner.suffix: demo site. After experiencing the full features,

hero.title: TranslateGemma Online Translation Tool
hero.description: Based on the latest Gemma 3 architecture, we provide an intelligent density translation engine. Whether running the 4B model offline on mobile devices or deploying the 27B flagship version on the cloud, TranslateGemma accurately captures subtle differences in slang, spoken language, and business contexts.

contentSummaryAgent.title: Ultimate Intelligent Density
contentSummaryAgent.description: The 4B model is optimized for mobile devices, and the 12B model runs smoothly on consumer-grade laptops with a 2x+ improvement in response speed. Native multimodality: directly extract and translate text from images (such as menus, notices) without additional OCR plugins, maintaining visual context consistency.

podcastAgent.title: Elegant Failure Logic
podcastAgent.description: Even when processing low-resource languages (such as Thai, Vietnamese), it can reduce hallucinations through Reinforcement Learning (RL) and generate natural expressions. Scenario-based mode injection: freely switch between spoken and official document modes based on specific Chat Template guidance, eliminating misinterpretation.

howToStart.question: Can TranslateGemma really run offline?
howToStart.answer: Yes. The 4B and 12B models are designed specifically for personal computing devices, and you can run them in a completely offline environment using Ollama or local applications.

voiceQuality.question: Is its translation quality really better than Google Translate?
voiceQuality.answer: In professional benchmark tests such as WMT24++, TranslateGemma, which has undergone two-stage fine-tuning, performs better in contextual naturalness and fidelity, especially suitable for processing unstructured and informal text.

contentOwnership.question: How to integrate it into my existing workflow?
contentOwnership.answer: We provide a standard OpenAI-compatible interface and support the apply_chat_template system, allowing you to integrate TranslateGemma into your SaaS products at extremely low cost.

dataPrivacy.question: Is my translation data secure?
dataPrivacy.answer: Yes, TranslateGemma values data security. It supports full Local Inference, ensuring that business secrets never leave your device and you have complete control over your data assets. When used online, translation data is transmitted encrypted, and all user data is only used for translation services and will not be disclosed to third parties.

pointsExpiry.question: Is technical support provided after purchase?
pointsExpiry.answer: Yes. The Pro version includes priority technical support, and the Enterprise version offers 7√ó24-hour technical support. This includes installation guidance, function consultation, problem resolution, etc. Basic version users can get support through the community.

upgradeAnytime.question: Can I upgrade my TranslateGemma plan at any time?
upgradeAnytime.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade to a higher-tier plan at any time. After upgrading, you will immediately get new features and a longer technical support period, and your purchased license remains valid.

enterpriseFeatures.question: What special features does the Enterprise version of TranslateGemma include?
enterpriseFeatures.answer: The Enterprise version provides customized development services for the 27B high-precision model, private deployment support, 7√ó24-hour technical support, team training and consulting, as well as custom industry corpus fine-tuning services, fully tailored solutions according to your business needs.

free.name: Basic (Personal)
free.description: Access to 4B/12B local models, 10k characters free daily quota, basic community support

pro.name: Professional (Pro)
pro.description: Access to 27B flagship cloud API, unlimited translation requests, priority technical support

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large enterprises, provides customized services

footer.description: Ready to experience contextual translation? Join 10,000+ developers and cross-border sellers in their choice. Based on Google Gemma 3 architecture, TranslateGemma supports 55+ languages, offering offline operation and cloud deployment to facilitate barrier-free cross-language communication.

testimonials.title: Industry Recognition
testimonials.description: Trusted by thousands of cross-border pioneers worldwide. TranslateGemma 12B even outperforms the 27B benchmark model with twice the parameter count. This is a major breakthrough in localization development.

items.name: Alex Johnson
items.title: Cross-border E-commerce CEO
items.content: TranslateGemma has enabled true contextual translation in our cross-border business! The 12B model runs smoothly on consumer-grade laptops, and the translation quality far exceeds traditional tools, allowing us to easily enter new markets.

items.name: Sarah Miller
items.title: International Product Manager
items.content: The offline capability of TranslateGemma is incredible! We can now provide translation services even in areas with poor connectivity. The 4B model runs perfectly on mobile devices.

items.name: Li Ming
items.title: Technical Director
items.content: As a technical director, I am impressed by TranslateGemma's Gemma 3 architecture. The multimodal translation feature allows our product to directly translate text in images, greatly improving the user experience.

items.name: David Chen
items.title: Developer
items.content: The OpenAI-compatible API makes integration seamless! We integrated TranslateGemma into our SaaS product in just hours. The context-aware translation is a game-changer.

items.name: Wang Xiaoyu
items.title: Independent Developer
items.content: TranslateGemma's local privacy-first design gives me peace of mind to use it. It supports full offline inference, ensuring that business secrets never leave the device and I have complete control over data assets. This is extremely important to us.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.title: Enterprise User
items.content: Perfect for enterprise deployment! The 27B model with custom domain fine-tuning has transformed our multilingual customer support. Translation quality is now native-level.

otherPosts.title: AI Translation Technology Sharing
otherPosts.description: Explore the latest technical trends and in-depth analysis of TranslateGemma

post1.title: What scenarios can TranslateGemma be applied to?
post1.excerpt: In-depth understanding of TranslateGemma's application scenarios, from personal daily translation to enterprise cross-border communication, to complete solutions for small language cultural exchanges.

post2.title: What core features does TranslateGemma have?
post2.excerpt: In-depth understanding of the core features provided by TranslateGemma: scenario-based mode injection, local privacy priority, two-stage fine-tuning enhancement, multimodal understanding, and other complete solutions.

post3.title: How do open-source translation models change cross-language communication?
post3.excerpt: In-depth understanding of the development trends, core advantages and application value of open-source translation technology, and how TranslateGemma leads the innovation of AI translation.
